text: Soni chisimu naga tuli tumpele kupasya ukoto wakuuma Kukwetu panyuma pa masausyo gagankwayiye, chisimu akasaŵechetaga kuti: “Ayi niyangune (ni jwaanguŵajilwa kupata yeleyi ligongo lyaumanyilisi wangu), soni nganguganichisya yanti Kiyama kuŵa nkwiima. Nambo naga timbuchisyidwe kwa Ambuje ŵangu, nikuti chisimu une tinjipata yambone Kukwakwe.” Basi tuchatagulila kwene aŵala ŵaakufuulu yaŵapanganyisye, ni chitukape kupasya kwene mu ilagasyo yakandapala
